Articles.Content:
Hi,

My real name is raoul, i live in Zweden but i come from holland and im 17 years old.

I did found this game for few days ago, and i did really like it, i did love to build rockets, but after a building a few rockets and testing them i did start to boring me, i wanted to reach something like the mun. so my question is what is a good rocket and how do i come at the moon?

And another question i play the demo now and is it worth buying it? What do you get.

I hope somebody could help me because my english isnt that good and think that the tutorial in game is a little bit to long.

Srry for my bad english.

Greetings Raoul.

This here is a great tutorial on how to make a nice rocket and take it to the Mun, you will be able to see the parts that are used in making it and how they are put together:

Welcome.

Edited May 17, 2013 by Custard Donut (In Space)
Welcome on board, have fun with you rockets - and fly safe

I had no trouble understanding your English. There is a whole section of the forum for tutorials and how-tos here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forumdisplay.php/15-How-To And I did make a training moon rocket for new players here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25029-A-moon-rocket-for-newbies, but I'm afraid it doesn't work in the demo. But if you do like the demo, you won't be sorry you bought the full game. It has more of everything! More parts to build with and more places to fly to.
hi, thank you all for the information, i will try to buy the game.

Welcome to the forums!

I can guarantee you that your English is better than either my Dutch or my Swedish, so don't feel bad about it. To my shame, it's even better composed than some people's messages for whom English is their native language...

The others have already pointed you in the right direction with specific tutorials. If you still want to learn more about what you can do with the game, I also maintain the Drawing Board (link in my sig), which has tons of links to tutorials and other useful resources.

Happy landings!
Hi i did have another question, what can you do with planes because i know that when you have a full game you could make planes or something.
